coreAttributes.authorTag: "MFD by DSG Tarp and Awning Co." is burned into one section.
coreAttributes.name: foldable awning poles
coreAttributes.description: Originally destined to become the haft of several battleaxes, this set of wooden poles has been re-purposed to hold up an awning instead.

effectTooltipLines.line: One of [style.colourGood(three)] items that you need to fix up Eisek's stall.

coreAttributes.applyEffects: The wooden poles are joined together with metal hinges and locking tubes allowing it to either unfold to a longer size or fold to a more compact size for travel.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfold)] the set of wooden poles and [npc.verb(take)] a closer look while resisting the urge to swing it around like a quarterstaff...
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfold)] the set of wooden poles for [npc2.name] to take a closer look at...
